item.description:
Join us to see "Grown Ups" at Revere Cinemas and dinner at Chatters bar and Grill (inside the theater lobby).

We are meeting at the bar of the restaurant at 6pm that way people can order when they get there.
The menus looks good. here is a link:
http://www.nationalam...

I'm sure we can catch a movie between 7 & 8. I will update the actual time as the day get closer

Grown Ups:
Five friends and former teammates reunite years later to honor the passing of their childhood basketball coach. With their wives and kids in tow, they spend the Fourth of July holiday weekend together at the lake house where they celebrated their championship years earlier. Picking up where they left off, they discover why growing older doesn't mean growing up.
item.name: DINNER & A MOVIE
